name: The Caslin Sisters
description:
In a city where the same day repeats over and over, Vi and April Caslin are part of the Underground, an organization aware of the loop and trying to break it.

Harkin, the leader of the Underground, has sent the sisters to a rooftop manor once home to an archmage. There, they are to steal the prized treasure of the Dragon, one of the city's three leaders.

Switch between the two sisters and trade items between them to escape the manor before  they lose their memories of their time in the Underground in tonight's Reset.

---

Created for the 5th Annual Driftwood Jam.

Per the rules of the event, it uses only resources from RPG Maker RTPs. (Although, I had it check for the font Verdana before using the RTP one, just like VX does by default. I hope that's still within the spirit...)

Plugins by:
Galv (https://galvs-scripts.com/)
HimeWorks (https://himeworks.com/)
mjshi (https://mjshi.weebly.com/)
Mr. Trivel (https://mrtrivelrpg.wordpress.com/)
SumRndmDde (http://sumrndm.site/)
Yanfly (https://yanflyengineplugins.itch.io/)
